question.title: CAS customization - endpoints expose
question.body:
I wish to upgrade Apereo CAS from 5.x to 7.x but there is a huge architecture change and the way the project is overlayed, i found documentation for everything except what i want. I want to create controller in cas overlay project and expose it for external api calls with authentication and without authentication. Please help. How do i modify CAS 6.x and above in order to create my custom controllers and expose endpoints.

I tried by simply creating Rest Controller classes and exposed its endpoints, but getting screen.error.page.authdenied screen.error.page.permissiondenied

Also i Tried to create Spring SecurityConfiguration but nothing worked out
